embeds.title: Minascan Block Explorer
embeds.description: Minascan is a Block Explorer and Analytics Platform for Mina, a lightweight succinct blockchain that uses ZK-proofs.

messages.content:
But I already funded the account using the faucet.
Btw, I am deploying the example zkApp.
Using zk deploy berkeley
Remember the accountUpdate sending Mina is the sender Publickey!
Hi @TheDude have you solved the issue? I have the same issue when deploying the contract.

Yes,
Setting gas to 0.1 works,
Also, if you are using old keys(keys generated by old version of zkapp-cli) you might want update zkapp-cli and create new keys.
Thank you. I've set the gas to 0.1 but I am using an existing account as the feePayer, it does not work. I will try to create a new account for the fee payer.
Changing the account makes it works 👍

Anyone encountering this problem, if it's during the deployment then please don't forget to
```
AccountUpdate.fundNewAccount(feePayer);
```
Lack of account creation fee will cause the `Invalid_fee_excess` error.
